Description.Text: Park Hyatt Busan is a contemporary 5-star superior property offering spacious accommodation near the heart of Busan. Highlights include a rooftop heated swimming pool, luxury spa, onsite dining and an excellent location overlooking the yacht marina. Haeundae Marina City is a fast-growing development area situated along the waterfront within easy reach of the main business areas. It boasts ultra-modern buildings which sit overlooking the marina. Nearby places of interest include Haeundae Beach, Busan Exhibition and Convention Cente and the Gwangan bridge. Dongbaek metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Busan destinations. The hotel occupies a stunning high-rise building featuring a curvilinear design and a sleek glass facade. Facilities include a rooftop heated swimming pool, state-of-the-art gym, seven spa treatment rooms, a relaxation room, sauna and steam room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Park rooms are 41-49sqm and decorated in a contemporary style. They boast floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the ocean, marina or city. Amenities include a 42-inch flat-screen TV, Blu-ray player, safe, mini-bar, work desk and en-suite bathroom. The Dining Room offers signature dishes in a sophisticated setting on the 32nd floor. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the lounge bar. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
